title: Remembering The Good | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Remembering The Good | Joel Osteen
description:
What you choose to remember can determine the type of life you’re going to live. Instead of reliving your past disappointments, choose to focus on the good things God has done in your life. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
